title: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content:
Hello, I just thought I'd post to say that I'm still alive.
But I'm wondering, what happened to all the old posts?

Oh, and please don't ask if I'm still making that mod I said I'd make...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-shucks.gif[/img]

title: Re: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content:
Hi, you must not have been here for a while:

The board was hacked, and we were cut down to nothing!!!

If only I could get my hands on that hacker!!!

Hi, I do remember you, though I wasn't a member then, I did follow the boards quite closely. I joined as soon as I got my own email address.

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Welcome Back!!!Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
--------------------------------------------------
Tough Guys Don't Follow Fads; the set them!!!
Kudos to Trensetters!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/tough_guys_wear_pink.jpg[/img]
"Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!"
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content:
Thanks. Yeah, I've been away for ages.
I'd heard something about the board being hacked. What are the specifics?Nothing in particular

title: Re: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content:
Some unknown person attacked the Ezboard servers. A lot of (most?) forums were affected. They recovered what they could, but a lot of stuff was lost.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]

title: Re: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content:
The entire attack was designed soley to remove the last traces of you from EZBoard; even now the government is trackling me down, trying to stop me spreading the truth about msqivibmil tebil.!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

-Levellord

title: Re: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content:
Ugh! *dies*

...

Anyway, no, I'm not making the mod any more, I stopped ages ago. I'm sorry, I really should have posted that I stopped making it.

I did start a Keen 3 level pack though... but I think I've abandoned that by now as well.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] Nothing in particular

title: Re: I'm Not Quite Dead!
content: Ok. :\ Too bad, Commander Keen 0 is one of the best mods in my opinion, because it's so bizarre. Well, hopefully you'll do some more later. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
